name: Genesis
summary:
The year is 2120, Earth has been attacked by an evil AI - GENESIS. One single fighter has broken through the ferocious siege, fight your way through hordes of enemies to reach the main processor of Genesis and destroy it.

The future of mankind depends on you...

Test your agility to dodge enemy fire and collect shield energy and power-ups from enemy remains. Make your way through 4 action packed levels and beat each boss to reach the main processor.
